content.body:
### Shop 275/45R18 Tire Size 
Maserati Ghibli, Mercedes-Benz S600, and Porsche Panamera: what do these vehicles all have in common? They’re all riding on 275/45R18 tires and might’ve rolled out of the factory with a set of[Pirelli P Zero](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/p-zero), Continental ContiSportContact 5, or Bridgestone RE050 tires attached. If you’re looking for tires in the 275/45R18 size, chances are you’re after a tire that performs and handles well, with a quiet, comfortable ride, long wear, year round traction and good road manners. 

Popular vehicles
2014-2015 Maserati Ghibli
2007-2012 Mercedes-Benz S600
2010-2016 Porsche Panamera

Looking for a set of tires that can help your Maserati Ghibli, Mercedes-Benz S600, or Porsche Panamera push the envelope? Ultra-high-performance tires are great for these vehicles, and tires like the Michelin Pilot Sport 4, Bridgestone Potenza Sport, and [Yokohama Advan Sport V105](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/advan-sport-v105) are great non-OE options if you want a set of 275/45R18 tires that offers sporty traction and handling.

While ultra-high-performance tires are great, they can’t be used when temperatures are consistently below 45 degrees Fahrenheit. Fortunately, winter tires are engineered to perform in these conditions. Consider the Pirelli Winter Sottozero 3 and [Nexen Winguard Sport 2](https://simpletire.com/brands/nexen-tires/winguard-sport-2) if you need a set of 275/45R18 tires that perform in lower temperatures, ice, slush, and snow.

Whether you drive a Maserati Ghibli, Mercedes-Benz S600, or Porsche Panamera, SimpleTire has a set of 275/45R18 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
